comment.author: Kyra
comment.text: You Black folks better wake up !! You were fed a bunch of lies !! It's not a Black against Whites race !! Come on and get on the band wagon!! We want America back for all of us Americans !! 😊❤️🇱🇷

replies.author: Breanna
replies.text: And voting trump is the answer the most disgusting person I have ever known

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: Kyra L., those black folks as you put it are wide a wake and they know what Donald Trump is all about. The majority of them have no intentions on getting on that ridiculous trump train that is running out of control and getting ready to crash.

replies.author: Kyra
replies.text: Sarah haha so you think Hillary is the answer ?Not hardly... My post my comment so go back in your corner .

replies.author: Kyra
replies.text: Breanna your opinion sweetie.. I had rather vote for someone that's not a liar and not a liberal.
